# Create Farenheit to Celsius function
```{r}
airtemps = c(212, 30.3, 78, 32)
FtoC = function(fahr) { 
  celsius <- (fahr-32) * (5/9)
  return(celsius)
}
# test the function
airtemps_C = FtoC(airtemps)
```

# Create Celsius to Farenheit function
```{r}
CtoF <- function(celsius) {
  farenheit <- celsius * (9/5) +32
  return(farenheit)
}
# test the function
CtoF(airtemps_C)
```
